title: Anoob Prakash
text: Highly skilled researcher with expertise in ecological and evolutionary genomics, plant biology, climate change and bioinformatics. Experienced in analyzing large-scale genomic data, conducting climate change adaptation studies, and teaching advanced scientific concepts. Adept at both independent and collaborative research in academic and non-academic settings.

title: Anoob Prakash
text:
